text: Incazelo yesivande leso esethenjiswa abalungileyo kusona phakathi kunemifula yamanzi angashintshi ubuwona kanye nemifula yobisi okungashintshi ukunambitheka kwayo kanye nemifula yewayini elimnandi kwabaliphuzayo kanye nemifula yoju olwenziwe kahle futhi okwabo lapho phakathi yizona zonke izinhlobonhlobo zezithelo nentethelelo evela eNkosini yabo, njengalabo abasemlilweni ingunaphakade futhi baphuziswe amanzi abilayo bese enquma amathumbu abo
